id.description: Unique identifier, auto-generated. It's the primary key.

inserted.description: Timestamp when current record is inserted

updated.description: Timestamp when current record is updated

etag.description: Possible ETag for all resources that are external. Allows for better synch-ing.

comments.description: General comments. Can be used for anything useful related to the instance.

email.description: Main email to communicate for that account

established.description: Date on which the account was established

enabled.description: Whether it is enabled or not. Disabled instances will not be used.

externalId.description: External unique ID, used to refer to external accounts

name.description: Descriptive name to identify the instance

preferences.description: All the general options associated with the account.

constraints.name: email
constraints.check: email IS NULL OR email RLIKE '^[^@]+@[^@]+[.][^@]{2,}$'

constraints.name: phone
constraints.check: phone IS NULL OR phone RLIKE '^[0-9]{8,16}$'
